content: 1 The oracle of the word of Yahweh､ unto Israel,—by the hand of Malachi.
content_old: 1 The oracle of the word of Yahweh､ unto Israel,—by the hand of Malachi.

content: 2 I have loved you､ Saith Yahweh, And yet ye say､ Wherein hast thou loved us? Is not Esau brother to Jacob? Enquireth Yahweh, Yet have I loved Jacob,
content_old: 2 I have loved you､ Saith Yahweh, And yet ye say､ Wherein hast thou loved us? Is not Esau brother to Jacob? Enquireth Yahweh, Yet have I loved Jacob,

content: 3 And Esau have I hated,— And made his mountains a desolation, And his inheritance a dwelling for the jackals of the wilderness.
content_old: 3 And Esau have I hated,— And made his mountains a desolation, And his inheritance a dwelling for the jackals of the wilderness.

content: 4 Whereas Edom may say､ We are laid waste､ but we will again build the desolate places Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ They may build､ But I will pull down,— And men shall call them､ The Boundary of Lawlessness, and The people with whom Yahweh hath indignation unto times age-abiding;
content_old: 4 Whereas Edom may say､ We are laid waste､ but we will again build the desolate places Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ They may build､ But I will pull down,— And men shall call them､ The Boundary of Lawlessness, and The people with whom Yahweh hath indignation unto times age-abiding;

content: 5 And your own eyes shall see,— And ye yourselves shall say､ Yahweh be magnified beyond the boundary of Israel.
content_old: 5 And your own eyes shall see,— And ye yourselves shall say､ Yahweh be magnified beyond the boundary of Israel.

content: 6 A son will honour a father, And a servant his lord,— If then a father I am where is mine honour? And if a lord I am where is my reverence? Saith Yahweh of hosts— To you､ ye priests､ who despise my Name, and yet say､ Wherein have we despised thy Name?
content_old: 6 A son will honour a father, And a servant his lord,— If then a father I am where is mine honour? And if a lord I am where is my reverence? Saith Yahweh of hosts— To you､ ye priests､ who despise my Name, and yet say､ Wherein have we despised thy Name?

content: 7 In bringing near upon mine altar､ polluted food, while yet ye say､ Wherein have we polluted thee? Because ye say､ As for the table of Yahweh a thing to be despised it is;
content_old: 7 In bringing near upon mine altar､ polluted food, while yet ye say､ Wherein have we polluted thee? Because ye say､ As for the table of Yahweh a thing to be despised it is;

content: 8 And when ye bring near the blind as a sacrifice､ saying— No harm! Or when ye bring near the lame or the sick､ saying— No harm! Offer it､ I pray you､ unto thy pasha, Will he accept thee? Or lift up thy countenance? Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 8 And when ye bring near the blind as a sacrifice､ saying— No harm! Or when ye bring near the lame or the sick､ saying— No harm! Offer it､ I pray you､ unto thy pasha, Will he accept thee? Or lift up thy countenance? Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 9 Now therefore､ pacify､ I pray you､ the face of GOD､ that he may grant us favour,—At your hands hath this come to pass, Will he lift up the countenances of any of you? Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 9 Now therefore､ pacify､ I pray you､ the face of GOD､ that he may grant us favour,—At your hands hath this come to pass, Will he lift up the countenances of any of you? Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 10 Who is there even among you that will shut the doors, so as not to set light to mine altar､ for nothing? I can take no pleasure in you､ Saith Yahweh of hosts, And your present can I not accept at your hand.
content_old: 10 Who is there even among you that will shut the doors, so as not to set light to mine altar､ for nothing? I can take no pleasure in you､ Saith Yahweh of hosts, And your present can I not accept at your hand.

content: 11 For from the rising of the sun､ even unto the going in thereof great is my Name､ among the nations, and in every place incense is offered to my Name､ and a pure present,—for great is my Name among the nations, Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 11 For from the rising of the sun､ even unto the going in thereof great is my Name､ among the nations, and in every place incense is offered to my Name､ and a pure present,—for great is my Name among the nations, Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 12 But ye are profaning me,—in that ye say､ As for the table of the Lord polluted it is, And as for his produce contemptible is his food.
content_old: 12 But ye are profaning me,—in that ye say､ As for the table of the Lord polluted it is, And as for his produce contemptible is his food.

content: 13 And ye have said､ Lo! what a weariness! And ye have snuffed at Me､ Saith Yahweh of hosts, And have brought in the torn and the lame and the sick, thus have ye brought the present,— Could I accept it at your hand? Saith Yahweh.
content_old: 13 And ye have said､ Lo! what a weariness! And ye have snuffed at Me､ Saith Yahweh of hosts, And have brought in the torn and the lame and the sick, thus have ye brought the present,— Could I accept it at your hand? Saith Yahweh.

content: 1 Now therefore､ for you is this charge､ O ye priests:—
content_old: 1 Now therefore､ for you is this charge､ O ye priests:—

content: 2 If ye will not hear､ and if ye will not lay it to heart､ to give glory to my Name､ Saith Yahweh of hosts then will I send among you the curse､ and will curse your blessings,—and indeed I have cursed them, because ye are not at all laying it to heart.
content_old: 2 If ye will not hear､ and if ye will not lay it to heart､ to give glory to my Name､ Saith Yahweh of hosts then will I send among you the curse､ and will curse your blessings,—and indeed I have cursed them, because ye are not at all laying it to heart.

content: 3 Behold me! threatening､ on your account､ the seed, and I will scatter refuse upon your faces, the refuse of your festivals,—and one shall carry you away unto it;
content_old: 3 Behold me! threatening､ on your account､ the seed, and I will scatter refuse upon your faces, the refuse of your festivals,—and one shall carry you away unto it;

content: 4 So shall ye know that I sent unto you this charge,—as being my covenant with Levi, Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 4 So shall ye know that I sent unto you this charge,—as being my covenant with Levi, Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 5 My covenant was with him､ Life and Well-being, So I gave them to him—I as One to be revered— And he did revere me,— And before my Name dismayed was he.
content_old: 5 My covenant was with him､ Life and Well-being, So I gave them to him—I as One to be revered— And he did revere me,— And before my Name dismayed was he.

content: 6 The deliverance of truth was in his mouth, And perverseness was not found in his lips,— In well-doing and in uprightness walked he with me, And multitudes did he turn from iniquity.
content_old: 6 The deliverance of truth was in his mouth, And perverseness was not found in his lips,— In well-doing and in uprightness walked he with me, And multitudes did he turn from iniquity.

content: 7 For the lips of a priest should keep knowledge, And a deliverance should men seek at his mouth,— For the messenger of Yahweh of hosts he is.
content_old: 7 For the lips of a priest should keep knowledge, And a deliverance should men seek at his mouth,— For the messenger of Yahweh of hosts he is.

content: 8 But ye have departed out of the way, Ye have caused multitudes to stumble at the deliverance,— Ye have violated the covenant of Levi, Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 8 But ye have departed out of the way, Ye have caused multitudes to stumble at the deliverance,— Ye have violated the covenant of Levi, Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 9 Therefore I also will suffer you to be despised and of no account､ unto all the people,— In proportion as none of you have been keeping my ways, But have had respect to persons､ in giving your deliverance.
content_old: 9 Therefore I also will suffer you to be despised and of no account､ unto all the people,— In proportion as none of you have been keeping my ways, But have had respect to persons､ in giving your deliverance.

content: 10 Is there not one Father to us all? Did not one GOD create us? Wherefore should we deal treacherously one with another, profaning the covenant of our fathers?
content_old: 10 Is there not one Father to us all? Did not one GOD create us? Wherefore should we deal treacherously one with another, profaning the covenant of our fathers?

content: 11 Judah hath dealt treacherously, And an abomination hath been wrought in Israel､ and in Jerusalem,— For Judah had profaned the holy place of Yahweh､ which he had loved, and hath taken to himself the daughter of a foreign GOD.
content_old: 11 Judah hath dealt treacherously, And an abomination hath been wrought in Israel､ and in Jerusalem,— For Judah had profaned the holy place of Yahweh､ which he had loved, and hath taken to himself the daughter of a foreign GOD.

content: 12 May Yahweh cut off､ from the man that doeth it—him that crieth out and him that answereth, out of the tents of Jacob,— Him also that bringeth near a present to Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 12 May Yahweh cut off､ from the man that doeth it—him that crieth out and him that answereth, out of the tents of Jacob,— Him also that bringeth near a present to Yahweh of hosts.

content: 13 And this､ a second time will ye do, covering､ with tears､ the altar of Yahweh, weeping and making outcry,—because he will not again turn unto the gift, and receive it with acceptance､ at your hands?
content_old: 13 And this､ a second time will ye do, covering､ with tears､ the altar of Yahweh, weeping and making outcry,—because he will not again turn unto the gift, and receive it with acceptance､ at your hands?

content: 14 Yet ye say､ For what cause? Because Yahweh hath been witness between thee and the wife of thy youth､ with whom thou hast dealt treacherously, though she was thy consort､ and thy covenant wife.
content_old: 14 Yet ye say､ For what cause? Because Yahweh hath been witness between thee and the wife of thy youth､ with whom thou hast dealt treacherously, though she was thy consort､ and thy covenant wife.

content: 15 Now was it not One who made you who had the residue of the spirit? What､ then､ of that One! He was seeking a godly seed. Therefore should ye take heed to your spirit, and with the wife of thy youth do not thou deal treacherously.
content_old: 15 Now was it not One who made you who had the residue of the spirit? What､ then､ of that One! He was seeking a godly seed. Therefore should ye take heed to your spirit, and with the wife of thy youth do not thou deal treacherously.

content: 16 For he hateth Divorce, Saith Yahweh､ God of Israel, Him also who covereth with violence his own clothing, Saith Yahweh of hosts,— Therefore should ye take heed to your spirit､ and not deal treacherously.
content_old: 16 For he hateth Divorce, Saith Yahweh､ God of Israel, Him also who covereth with violence his own clothing, Saith Yahweh of hosts,— Therefore should ye take heed to your spirit､ and not deal treacherously.

content: 1 Behold me! sending my messenger, Who will prepare a way before me,— And suddenly shall come to his temple The Lord whom ye are seeking Even the messenger of the covenant in whom ye are delighting､ Lo! he cometh! Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 1 Behold me! sending my messenger, Who will prepare a way before me,— And suddenly shall come to his temple The Lord whom ye are seeking Even the messenger of the covenant in whom ye are delighting､ Lo! he cometh! Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 2 But who may endure the day of his coming? And who is he that can stand when he appeareth? For he is like a refiner’s fire, And like fullers’ alkali;
content_old: 2 But who may endure the day of his coming? And who is he that can stand when he appeareth? For he is like a refiner’s fire, And like fullers’ alkali;

content: 3 Therefore will he sit as a refiner and purifier of silver, And will purify the sons of Levi､ And will smelt them, as gold and as silver; So shall they belong to Yahweh, Offering a gift in righteousness.
content_old: 3 Therefore will he sit as a refiner and purifier of silver, And will purify the sons of Levi､ And will smelt them, as gold and as silver; So shall they belong to Yahweh, Offering a gift in righteousness.

content: 4 Then shall the gift of Judah and Jerusalem be pleasant to Yahweh,— As in the days of age-past times, And as in the ancient years.
content_old: 4 Then shall the gift of Judah and Jerusalem be pleasant to Yahweh,— As in the days of age-past times, And as in the ancient years.

content: 5 Therefore will I draw near unto you for judgment, And will become a swift witness Against the mutterers of incantations､ and Against the adulterers, and Against them that swear to a falsehood,—and Against them who rob the hire of the hireling､ the widow and the fatherless､ And that drive away the sojourner､ And do not revere me, Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 5 Therefore will I draw near unto you for judgment, And will become a swift witness Against the mutterers of incantations､ and Against the adulterers, and Against them that swear to a falsehood,—and Against them who rob the hire of the hireling､ the widow and the fatherless､ And that drive away the sojourner､ And do not revere me, Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 6 Because I､ Yahweh have not changed therefore ye､ the sons of Jacob have not been utterly consumed.
content_old: 6 Because I､ Yahweh have not changed therefore ye､ the sons of Jacob have not been utterly consumed.

content: 7 From the days of your fathers have ye departed from my statutes､ and not observed them, Return ye unto me､ That I may return unto you, Saith Yahweh of hosts. And yet ye say､ Wherein shall we return?
content_old: 7 From the days of your fathers have ye departed from my statutes､ and not observed them, Return ye unto me､ That I may return unto you, Saith Yahweh of hosts. And yet ye say､ Wherein shall we return?

content: 8 Will a son of earth defraud God? Nevertheless ye have been defrauding me, And yet ye say､ Wherein have we defrauded thee? In the tithe and the offering.
content_old: 8 Will a son of earth defraud God? Nevertheless ye have been defrauding me, And yet ye say､ Wherein have we defrauded thee? In the tithe and the offering.

content: 9 With a curse have ye been cursing, And yet me have ye been defrauding,—the whole nation.
content_old: 9 With a curse have ye been cursing, And yet me have ye been defrauding,—the whole nation.

content: 10 Bring ye all the tithe into the store-house､ that there may be food in my house, Yea､ I pray you､ put me to the proof hereby, Saith Yahweh of hosts, whether I will not open to you the sluices of the heavens, and pour out for you blessing, until there be no room.
content_old: 10 Bring ye all the tithe into the store-house､ that there may be food in my house, Yea､ I pray you､ put me to the proof hereby, Saith Yahweh of hosts, whether I will not open to you the sluices of the heavens, and pour out for you blessing, until there be no room.

content: 11 Then will I rebuke､ for you､ the devourer that he spoil not､ for you､ the fruit of the ground,— Neither shall the vine in the field be barren to you､ Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 11 Then will I rebuke､ for you､ the devourer that he spoil not､ for you､ the fruit of the ground,— Neither shall the vine in the field be barren to you､ Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 12 So shall all the nations pronounce you happy,— For ye shall become､ a land of delight, Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 12 So shall all the nations pronounce you happy,— For ye shall become､ a land of delight, Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 13 Stout against me have been your words､ Saith Yahweh,— And yet ye say､ What have we spoken､ one to another､ against thee?
content_old: 13 Stout against me have been your words､ Saith Yahweh,— And yet ye say､ What have we spoken､ one to another､ against thee?

content: 14 Ye have said､ Vain is it to serve God,—and What profit When we have kept his charge, or When we have walked gloomily before Yahweh of hosts?
content_old: 14 Ye have said､ Vain is it to serve God,—and What profit When we have kept his charge, or When we have walked gloomily before Yahweh of hosts?

content: 15 Now therefore､ we are pronouncing happy—the proud,—and The doers of lawlessness have even been built up, and They who have put God to the proof have even been delivered.
content_old: 15 Now therefore､ we are pronouncing happy—the proud,—and The doers of lawlessness have even been built up, and They who have put God to the proof have even been delivered.

content: 16 Then they who revered Yahweh conversed､ one with another ,— And Yahweh hearkened､ and heard, And there was written a book of remembrance before him､ For them who revered Yahweh, And for such as thought of his Name.
content_old: 16 Then they who revered Yahweh conversed､ one with another ,— And Yahweh hearkened､ and heard, And there was written a book of remembrance before him､ For them who revered Yahweh, And for such as thought of his Name.

content: 17 Therefore shall they be mine､ Saith Yahweh of hosts, in the day､ for which I am preparing treasure,— And I will deal tenderly with them, Just as a man dealeth tenderly with his own son who is serving him.
content_old: 17 Therefore shall they be mine､ Saith Yahweh of hosts, in the day､ for which I am preparing treasure,— And I will deal tenderly with them, Just as a man dealeth tenderly with his own son who is serving him.

content: 1 For lo! the day cometh, that burneth as a furnace,— And all the proud and everyone who worketh lawlessness! shall be stubble, And the day that cometh shall consume them utterly､ Saith Yahweh of hosts, that it shall leave them neither root nor branch.
content_old: 1 For lo! the day cometh, that burneth as a furnace,— And all the proud and everyone who worketh lawlessness! shall be stubble, And the day that cometh shall consume them utterly､ Saith Yahweh of hosts, that it shall leave them neither root nor branch.

content: 2 So shall the sun of righteousness arise to you who revere my Name､ with healing in his wings,— And ye shall come forth and leap for joy like calves let loose from the stall;
content_old: 2 So shall the sun of righteousness arise to you who revere my Name､ with healing in his wings,— And ye shall come forth and leap for joy like calves let loose from the stall;

content: 3 And ye shall tread down the lawless, for they shall be ashes under the soles of your feet,—in the day when I am working with effect, Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 3 And ye shall tread down the lawless, for they shall be ashes under the soles of your feet,—in the day when I am working with effect, Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 4 Remember ye the law of Moses my servant,—which I commanded him in Horeb､ for all Israel, Statutes and regulations.
content_old: 4 Remember ye the law of Moses my servant,—which I commanded him in Horeb､ for all Israel, Statutes and regulations.

content: 5 Lo! I am sending unto you Elijah the prophet,— Before the coming of the great and awful day of Yahweh;
content_old: 5 Lo! I am sending unto you Elijah the prophet,— Before the coming of the great and awful day of Yahweh;
